title: A Very delicate matter (short version)
creator_credit: Claude Kerven, Patrick McCormick and Highgate Pictures
brief_description: A narrative which highlights the importance of honesty in sexual relationships where venereal disease is concerned. Stresses the responsibility to inform other sexual partners if one discovers one has the disease and indicates the possible consequences of the disease if it is left unchecked.
